verbose_text: Although treatment with PGD2, PGE2, or PGI2 had no significant effect on the expression of ucp1 and C/EBPbeta in differentiated primary adipocytes (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), treatment of these PGs upregulated protein and mRNA levels of UCP1 and C/EBPbeta during the differentiation of primary iWAT derived preadipocytes (from day 1 to day 4).
